summary: This is a simply follower mod that adds to your game "Alis, The Female Ebony Warrior"
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#999999]
[/color][/size][size=4][color=#999999]

[center][b]First considerations 
[/b][/center][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/1238a58cb2f740c798c05be2e5574f4d.png[/img]

[/font][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b]   Hi everyone, this is my first mod ever made, then if it have some bugs, I'm really sorry about it.
[/b][/size][/color][/font][color=#000000][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS]   Sorry for my bad english too, I'm not from any country that speaks english.[/font][/b]
[b]
[/b][/size][/color][center][color=#999999][size=3][b]
About This Mod[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=3][b]   This is a simply follower mod that adds to your game "Alis, The Female Ebony Warrior"
   She is a breton who cames from High Rock to Skyrim to train her skills in combat[/b]
[/size][/color][/font]

[b]

[font=Tahoma][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/b][center][/center][color=#999999][center][size=3][b]Equipments and Skills[/b][/size][/center]
[/color]

[font=Tahoma]       [/font][font=Comic Sans MS]  [/font][font=Arial][size=5]She has :[/size][/font]

[size=3][color=#000000][font=Tahoma]  [/font][font=Comic Sans MS]  [b]- A full set of ebony (Without helmet);
   - A Ebony Warhammer;
    -A Ebony Bow of Paralysis;
    She can summon a Dremora Lord;
[/b][/font][/color][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/size]

[center]
[color=#999999][size=4]Where to find her?[/size][/color][/center][b][size=3]

[/size][/b][img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/bb5a472702af4e6189d04e4620c67bc6.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][b][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000]   She is waiting for you inside the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood.[/color][/font]
[/size][/b]
author: Viktohr
